title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 114.2 - Land requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 114.2 - Land requirements

State Regulations
A crop for the production of certified seed shall not be
planted on land where squash, cucumbers, melons, pumpkins or other cucurbit
crops were grown the previous year. The grower should be further cautioned of
the risks involved if his fields are bordered by woods, ditch banks or fence
rows that sustain species of plants known to be reservoir hosts of cucurbit
viruses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
114.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
